content:
Referential Members (2)

  • 3.1.4 Operations on a referential member do not affect the resource it references [except as needed to enforce referential integrity].

  • 3.1.5 Operations on a resource do not affect references to it [except as needed to enforce referential integrity].

  • 3.1.6 For any referential member of a collection, it is possible to obtain the URI of the resource it references.
